events.text: Ahead of you is a large open room, a part of a larger keep seemingly untouched by time. Do You want to enter?

alternativ.text: Yes, how has this keep been preserved so well?

event.text: Oddly cozy though...
Oh. Okay then.
You want a gun?
Sorry, I don't do repeat customers.......

failstate.text: Here ya go kid. Hope you don't need ammo :p

event.text: Now scram, i got work to do
Then scram, i got work to do
I smell hax boy.
Your hax are annoying.
You head back outside like the scared weakling you are.
Stop being indesicive

events.text: There seems to a doorway here, would you look at that...

alternativ.text: Sure, sounds cool, I'll uh.. just enter private property..

event.text: A wierd room, what could it be used for? Blood censored out because of weaklings.

alternativ.text: No thanks, again, I have survival instincts.

event.text: Smart move, you head back.
...... fine, be that way. Your adventure continues.....
........ well, have a nice trip i guesss. Your adventure continues.....

events.text: The door doesn't close behind you for once.. is it really a dungeon? Want to head back?

event.text: You turn around and head back. Weak.

alternativ.text: Nah, I'll stay, seems cool so far, love what they've done with the place.

event.text: You stay... again...

events.text: A smaller chamber lies ahead, slightly threatening, do you enter?

alternativ.text: I have no survival instincts, bring it on.

event.text: The room is a lot less.. grand it seems...

alternativ.text: I have survival instincts. No thanks.

event.text: Oh. Okay then.

events.text: You sure you want to keep going? Seems kinda.. odd.. and that dude isn't moving..

alternativ.text: Yeah, I'm staying, he seems cool.

event.text: You.. foolhardishly stay...

alternativ.text: I want to go home again, this is weird and creepy.

event.text: Finally you talk sense!

events.text: You did it, you made it past all my traps and you've defeated me! As expected of the Hero! Here is my book, read it and all will be over.

alternativ.text: You know what? I want to fall for obvious trap. I'll read it.

event.text: You read it.. you fool. There is no escape.

alternativ.text: Nah, I'm good. I don't like to open random books for people.

event.text: Too bad you don't have to read it to be stuck here forever...
